advisory.name: RLSA-2022:7070
advisory.topic:
An update for firefox is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
advisory.description:
Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser, designed for standards compliance, performance, and portability.
This update upgrades Firefox to version 102.4.0 ESR.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

fixes.description: CVE-2022-42927 Mozilla: Same-origin policy violation could have leaked cross-origin URLs
CVE-2022-42928 Mozilla: Memory Corruption in JS Engine
CVE-2022-42929 Mozilla: Denial of Service via window.print
CVE-2022-42932 Mozilla: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 106 and Firefox ESR 102.4
